Interface FuzzySet

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Singleton, Trapezoid, Triangular

    public interface FuzzySet

      java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Double> getKernel()
      Set of values where = {x e X | u(x) = 1}

    • Method Detail

      • eval

        double eval(Variable s)
        Evaluate the membership of the set with the especified value. Alias of eval(s.getValue()).
        Parameters:
        s - Value to evaluate.
        Returns:
        The membership value for the input.

      • eval

        double eval(double s)
        Evaluate the membership of the set with the especified value.
        Parameters:
        s - Value to evaluate.
        Returns:
        The membership value for the input.

      • getSupport

        java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Double> getSupport()
        Set of values where = {x e X | u(x) > 0}
        Returns:
        The set of values where the membership is greater than zero.

      • getKernel

        java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Double> getKernel()
        Set of values where = {x e X | u(x) = 1}
        Returns:
        The set of values where the membership is exactly one.
